import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import ProjectCard from "./ProjectCards"; import Particle from "../Particle"; import PaperCards from "./PaperCards"; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; function Projects() { const { t } = useTranslation('common'); return (

{t("My Recent")} {t("Projects")}

{t("Because of the non-disclosure terms, only the description and role of product projects are shown.")}

{t("My Recent")} {t("Publications")}

); } export default Projects;
